text:
- 체류지 입증서류
- 외국인 직업 신고서(별도서식)
- 사업자등록증 사본, 법인등기사항전부증명서, 주식변동상황명세서 원본
- 외국인투자기업등록증 사본
- 주재활동의 경우 파견명령서*(파견기간 명시) 및 재직증명서
* 해외 본사 발급 파견명령서 또는 해외 본사의 제3국 현지 법인에서 발급된 파견명령서
- 외국인투자촉진법 시행규칙에 따라 산업통상자원부장관이 지정한 ‘지역본부(제9조의4)’ 또는 ‘연구개발시설(제16조)’은 지정서 및 근무인력 명단(성명, 직책, 학력, 연구경력, 근무분야 등) 추가 제출
- 보건소 또는 법무부 지정병원 발급 결핵진단서(해당자에 한함, 유효기간 3개월)
[투자자금 도입관련 입증서류]
1) 현금출자의 경우
- 해당국 세관이나 본국 은행 (금융기관)의 외화반출허가(신고)서 (해당자)
- 투자자금 도입 내역서 (송금확인증, 외국환 매입증명서, 세관신고서 등)
2) 현물출자의 경우
- 현물출자완료 확인서 사본(관세청장 발행)
- 세관 수입신고필증 사본
[투자금액 3억원 미만 개인투자자에 대한 추가서류]
- 자본금 사용내역 입증서류 (물품구매 영수증, 사무실 인테리어 비용, 국내은행 계좌 입출금 내역서 등)
- 사업장 존재 입증 서류 (사무실 임대차 계약서, 사업장 전경`사무공간`간판 사진 등 자료)
- 해당 업종 또는 분야의 사업 경험 관련 국적국 서류 (필요시 징구)
trans:
- proof of place of stay
- Foreigner's Job Declaration (Separate Form)
- Copy of business registration certificate, certificate of all corporate registration, original stock change status statement
- Copy of foreign investment company registration certificate
- In the case of  overseas resident activities, a dispatch order* (specifying the dispatch period) and a certificate of employment
* Dispatch order issued by overseas headquarters or dispatching order issued by a local corporation in a third country of overseas headquarters
- According to the Enforcement Regulations of the Foreign Investment Promotion Act, the 'regional headquarters (Article 9-4)' or 'R&D facilities (Article 16)' designated by the Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy additionally submitted a letter of designation and a list of workers (name, position, educational background, research experience, work field, etc.)
- A tuberculosis certificate issued by a public health center or a hospital designated by the Ministry of Justice (limited to the relevant person, valid period of 3 months)
[Proof documents related to introduction of investment funds]
1) In case of cash investment
- Foreign currency withdrawal permission (report) from the relevant country's customs office or the home country's bank (financial institution) (applicable)
- Investment fund introduction details (remittance confirmation, foreign exchange purchase certificate, customs declaration, etc.)
2) In case of investment in-kind
- Copy of confirmation of completion of investment in-kind (issued by the head of the Korea Customs Service)
- Copy of customs import declaration certificate
[Additional documents for individual investors with investment amounts of less than 300 million won]
- Documents proving the details of capital use (receipts for purchasing goods, office interior expenses, domestic bank account deposit and withdrawal statements, etc.)
- Documents proving the existence of a business place (office lease agreement, foreground of business place 'office space 'signal photo, etc.)
- Documents from the country of nationality related to business experience in the relevant industry or field (requested if necessary)
